tasks.label: build my program
args: g++ -c  include/readFile.cpp  $(llvm-config --cxxflags) -o include/readFile.o && g++ -c dataFlow_Analysis/Live_Variables/setBB.cpp $(llvm-config --cxxflags) -o dataFlow_Analysis/Live_Variables/setBB.o && g++  include/readFile.o dataFlow_Analysis/Live_Variables/setBB.o -o output_program  $(llvm-config --ldflags --libs core support)
